name: ciagneis 2D Shooter
description: For my proposed game modifications, I'm going to try to do a little bit of everything. Design wise, I plan to make 3 coherent levels and modify the in-game menus. On the aesthetics side, I'll try to reskin the players or enemies and/or add more environment factors. And finally, I'll edit the gameplay to change how the game is actually played (modified ship controls and obstacles).
